com.bergerkiller.bukkit.tc.attachments.ui

Class MapWidgetAttachmentTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.map.widgets.MapWidget
      • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.tc.attachments.ui.MapWidgetAttachmentTree
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.controller.Tickable, com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.map.MapDisplayEvents

    public abstract class MapWidgetAttachmentTree
extends com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.map.widgets.MapWidget
    The tree view storing all the map widget attachment nodes. Manages the selection and adding/removing of nodes in the tree. Also manages the view area scrolling for larger trees.
